mapper.select: SELECT CommentID, FormInstID, ProcessID, UserCode, UserName, InsertDate, Mode, Kind, Comment, Comment_fileinfo FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_comment WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_approval4j.jwf_comment (FormInstID, ProcessID, UserCode, UserName,InsertDate, Mode, Kind, Comment, Comment_fileinfo) VALUES (#{FormInstID}, #{ProcessID}, #{UserCode}, #{UserName}, now(3), #{Mode}, #{Kind}, #{Comment}, #{Comment_fileinfo})
mapper.update: UPDATE covi_approval4j.jwf_processdescription SET IsComment = 'Y' WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID}
mapper.select: SELECT WI.TaskID, WI.UserCode, WI.DeputyID, WI.WorkItemID, P.ProcessID, FI.Subject, P.FormName, FI.InitiatorID FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_workitem WI INNER join covi_approval4j.jwf_process P ON WI.ProcessID = P.ProcessID INNER join covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance FI ON P.FormInstID = FI.FormInstID WHERE FI.FormInstID = #{FormInstID} AND WI.TaskID != #{TaskID} AND (WI.SubKind IS NULL OR WI.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021')) AND WI.Deleted IS null
